DOC.brief_summary: This three-arm cluster randomize trial develop , test , compare efficacy two delivery format Women 's CoOp ( WC ) , design provide risk reduction empowerment skill , well linkages healthcare service substance-using woman . The current study develop revise version WC evaluate relative efficacy face-to-face ( face-to-face WC ) , mobile Health application ( mHealth WC ) delivery format , HIV counsel test ( HCT ) control reduce risky sexual behavior , reduce substance use , increase linkage care among young ( 18-25 year ) substance - use African American woman sexually active recently test HIV three NC county .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study use seek , test , treat , retain framework develop test efficacy clinic-based , age-appropriate , woman-focused HIV intervention reduce sexual risk increase receipt health service among 700 young sexually active drug-using , African American woman age 18 25 three North Carolina county . We test delivery woman-focused intervention conduct two format , face- to-face WC mHealth WC , use three-arm cluster-randomized design county randomize ( 1 ) HCT control , ( 2 ) face-to-face WC ; ( 3 ) mobile health application mHealth WC deliver tablet use interactive app . We fulfill purpose study follow aim : ( Aim 1 ) To develop new WC intervention recruitment strategy use formative method engage substance-using young African American woman recently test HIV , clinic staff , stakeholder ensure age appropriateness , identify barrier reach young woman challenge conduct intervention clinic , develop mHealth WC ; ( Aim 2 ) To test efficacy two format woman-focused intervention program ( face-to-face WC mHealth WC ) relative HCT 700 young woman age 18 25 three North Carolina county health department primary outcomes 6- , 12-month follow-up assessment : assess access , referral , retention health service , substance abuse treatment , reproductive health care , health care ; ( Aim 3 ) To estimate total cost implement face-to-face WC mHealth WC intervention , assess resource component drive cost ; ( Aim 4 ) To examine extent face-to-face WC mHealth WC perceive collaborate health clinic staff participant acceptable sustainable .
